summary: Tested StaffDetailModal certificate display feature. Modal opens correctly, Formação Acadêmica section displays formations/especializações. Certificate links and Documentos Anexados section are conditionally rendered based on data availability.
critical_code_review_comments: Code correctly handles both string and object formats for formações/especializações using getFormacaoInfo helper
Proper null checks with optional chaining throughout the component
Certificate links and Documentos Anexados section only render when certificates exist
context_for_next_testing_agent: StaffDetailModal certificate feature tested. Current server (RICLEIDE DA SILVA GONÇALVES) has formations as simple strings without certificates attached. The code handles this correctly. To fully test certificate display, a server with certificates needs to be created via the upload feature in StaffModal.

feature_1_modal_opens.description: Modal 'Detalhes do Servidor' opens when clicking eye icon in staff table
feature_1_modal_opens.evidence: Screenshot shows modal with server details

feature_2_formacao_academica_section.description: Formação Acadêmica section displays correctly with formations and especializações
feature_2_formacao_academica_section.evidence: Shows PEDAGOGIA, LETRAS as formações and EDUCAÇÃO ESPECIAL as especialização

feature_3_certificate_links.description: Certificate links render conditionally when certificado_url exists
feature_3_certificate_links.evidence: No certificate links shown because current server has no certificates - code handles this correctly

feature_4_documentos_anexados_section.description: Documentos Anexados section renders only when certificates exist
feature_4_documentos_anexados_section.evidence: Section not shown because no certificates exist - code handles this correctly

code_review.getFormacaoInfo_helper: Correctly handles string (returns {nome: string, certificado_url: null}) and object (returns {nome, certificado_url}) formats
code_review.formacao_section: Lines 120-181 - Properly iterates formações and especializações, displays certificate links when available
code_review.documentos_section: Lines 183-229 - Collects all certificates and displays in unified section with count
